name: SPACE WARS (itch) (OrfeasWorldGames Studio)
description:
SPACE WARS IS INSPIRED BY THE METEOR RUN MADE BY FUTURE GAMES. IT'S A 8-BIT ARCADE GAME THAT BRINGS YOU THE OLD GAMING 20 YEARS BEFORE! THE ARCADE STYLE!

_____SPACE WARS FEATURES_____

-MOVE WITH THE ARROW KEYS

-SWITCH TO THE SECOND WEAPON BY PRESSING THE CHANGE BUTTON!

FIND US ON ROAST MY GAME HERE: https://roastmygame.com/profile/Orfea...
